dialogue.text: I can't believe I signed up for this 'Build a Table, Find Love' event. What was I thinking?
Hey there! You must be new. I'm Molly, the event organizer. Ready to build some romance?
Uh, hi Molly. I'm not sure I'm cut out for this...
Nonsense! Everyone's got a little carpenter in them. And who knows, you might just build a connection along the way!

choices.text: I guess I could give it a shot.

dialogue.text: That's the spirit! Now, let's see what you can do with these pieces of wood and your bare hands.
Wow, you're really getting into it! Your table is starting to take shape.
Thanks! I'm surprised at how much fun this is.
See? I told you! There's something special about creating with your own hands.
And... time's up! Let's see what you've built.
I hope it's not too wobbly...
It's perfect! Just like the connection we've built today.
Molly, would you like to grab coffee sometime? Maybe at a table that's not handmade?
I'd love to! Who knew building tables could lead to building relationships?
Thanks for everything, Molly. This was surprisingly fun!
I'm glad you enjoyed it! Remember, whether it's tables or relationships, it's all about putting in the effort and having fun along the way.
Sorry, but this really isn't my thing. I'm going to head out.
Oh, that's a shame. Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find us!
Who would have thought a table-building event could be so life-changing?
